content: व्यवहारः {@--1@} Conduct, behaviour, action. {@--2@} Affair, business, work. {@--3@} Profession, occupation. {@--4@} Dealing, transaction. {@--5@} Commerce, trade, traffic. {@--6@} Dealing in money, usury. {@--7@} Usage, custom, an established rule or practice. {@--8@} Relation, connection; <ls>Pt. 1. 79.</ls> {@--9@} Judicial procedure, trial or investigation of a case, administration of justice; व्यवहारस्तमाह्वयति; अलं लज्जया व्यवहारस्त्वां पृच्छति <ls>Mk. 9.</ls> {@--10@} A legal dispute, complaint, suit, law-suit, litigation; व्यवहारोऽयं चारुदत्तप्तवलंबते, इति लिख्यतां व्यवहारस्य प्रथमः पा दः, केन सह मम व्यवहारः <ls>Mk. 9</ls>; <ls>R. 17. 39.</ls> {@--11@} A title of legal procedure, any occasion of litigation.
